title: Los Angeles Department Water Quality
description: Tap water quality of the Los Angeles Department of Water and Power

body.raw: ## Los Angeles Water Supply Overview **Oaisys score:** 15 / 100 **Contaminants exceeding health guidelines**: 9 **Total contaminants**: 30 # Los Angeles Contaminants detected **Arsenic**: 430x health guidelines - Potential effect: skin, bladder, and lung cancers; skin discoloration and lesions. - This source 1.72 ppb - Health Guideline: 0.004 ppb - Legal Limit: 10 ppb **Haloacetic acids (HAA9)**: 184x health guidelines - Potential effect: cancer - This source: 11 ppb - Health Guideline: 0.06 ppb - Legal Limit: none **Haloacetic acids (HAA5)9**: 103x health guidelines - Potential effect: cancer and may impair fetal growth and development. - This source: 10.3 ppb - Health Guideline: 0.1 ppb - Legal Limit: 60 ppb ## Los Angeles Oaisys Page [See full report](https://www.oaisys.ai/blog/los_angeles_tap_water_quality) ## Brita Filter Sources [EWG](https://www.ewg.org/tapwater/system.php?pws=CA1910067)
